metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16062 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
dwarf_getaranges in dwarf_getaranges.c in libdw in elfutils before 2018-08-18 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16062` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.176-1.1
libasm1 - 0.176-1.1
libdw1 - 0.176-1.1
libelf1 - 0.176-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
